nodes.title: CLIP Text Encode (Negative Prompt)
widgets_values: Overexposure, static, blurred details, subtitles, paintings, pictures, still, overall gray, worst quality, low quality, JPEG compression residue, ugly, mutilated, redundant fingers, poorly painted hands, poorly painted faces, deformed, disfigured, deformed limbs, fused fingers, cluttered background, three legs, a lot of people in the background, upside down

nodes.title: Pixaroma - Note - Settings
widgets_values:
# üé• Recommended Settings for Wan 2.1  

## ‚úÖ Recommended Width and Height  
### **480p**  
- **Landscape (16:9)** ‚Üí `832x480px`  
- **Portrait (9:16)** ‚Üí `480x832px`  
- **Square (1:1)** ‚Üí `640x640px`  

---  

## ‚úÖ Recommended Length (Frames)  

### **For 16 FPS:**  
**Duration ‚Üí Length Value (in the Latent Video Node)** 
- **1 second** ‚Üí `17 frames`  
- **2 seconds** ‚Üí `33 frames`  
- **3 seconds** ‚Üí `49 frames`  
- **4 seconds** ‚Üí `65 frames`  
- **5 seconds** ‚Üí `81 frames`  

### **For 24 FPS:**  
**Duration ‚Üí Length Value (in the Latent Video Node)**  
- **1 second** ‚Üí `25`  
- **2 seconds** ‚Üí `49`  
- **3 seconds** ‚Üí `73`  
- **4 seconds** ‚Üí `97`  
- **5 seconds** ‚Üí `121`  

‚ö° **16 FPS is generated faster than 24 FPS, but 24 FPS gives smoother motion.**  

---  

## ‚úÖ Formula to Calculate Length  
*(Remember to add an extra frame!)*  
üìå **Formula:**  
`Frames = (Seconds √ó FPS) + 1`  

*(Check `frame_rate` in the **Video Combine Node**)  

### **Example Calculations:**  
üìå **For 3 seconds at 24 FPS:**  
`(3 √ó 24) + 1 = 73 frames`  

üìå **For 3 seconds at 16 FPS:**  
`(3 √ó 16) + 1 = 49 frames`  

---  

## ‚úÖ KSampler Settings  
### **Recommended Steps:**  
üîπ `15-30 steps` *(up to 50, try 30)*  

### **Recommended CFG:**  
üîπ `5-7` *(Try 6)*  

---  

## ‚úÖ Recommended Frame Rate (**Video Combine Node**)  
- **16 FPS** ‚Üí ‚è© Faster generation, but less smooth motion  
- **24 FPS** ‚Üí üï∞Ô∏è Slower generation, but smoother video  

üìå **If you change the frame rate, adjust the Length in the WanImageToVideo Node.**

[üîó Direct Download](https://huggingface.co/city96/Wan2.1-I2V-14B-480P-gguf/resolve/main/wan2.1-i2v-14b-480p-Q4_0.gguf?download=true)

Or download a **bigger or smaller model** depending on your VRAM:

nodes.title: CLIP Text Encode (Positive Prompt)
widgets_values: A beautiful woman stands up and walks to the right, the woman should stay in frame the whole time, the woman should keep her eyes on the camera, long brunette straight hair, large breasts, joyful expression, highly detailed, high contrast, film grain, The cinematic camera moves smoothly, enhancing the woman's graceful motion.
